channel.title: Need Suggestions

thanks

item.title: Need Suggestions
item.dc:creator: @MicroZoft MicroZoft
item.description:
@MicroZoft wrote:

[quote=“Mary|Jane, post:3, topic:198144”]Edge based, and make food timers, mage timers, perfect dds specials, and a great econemy, don’t add a godsword mini-game, make GodWars.

Then you’ll have everyone playing, :).[/quote]
hmm sounds good although, i want to be able to be done within the next month. because i’ve gotten the online beta for mgs4 and want to be able to get the most out of it.

Read full topic
